channel.title: Game force minimizes and cannot open again
channel.description:
What happened:
The game (randomly) flashes and minimizes itself. Any attempt to re-open the game only results in me being able to see the sword mouse icon but my desktop stays in front of me. I have to force close the game before I can do anything else at this point. This happens constantly in both Windowed and Fullscreen mode.
My specs: GTX 980, I7-4790K, 16GB Ram, on SSD Drive.
What was SUPPOSED to happen:
I was supposed to enjoy playing the game without fear of it crashing.
Steps to reproduce this issue:
1. Start the Game 2. Play the Game for a length of time 3. Get a good role (jk)
Thank You for any help. I will try and take a pic next time it happens. (There is no crash report as the game "minimizes")

item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Hi there –

This isn’t actually a ToL issue:

https://steamcommunity.com/app/415200/discussions/0/217691032449213266/

Try updating your gfx card and using compatability mode. There are also hints about issues with DirectX - perhaps Google a repair utility.

Alternately, try launching with Vulcan instead of DirectX (there are 2 launch options).
